node.title: Full interview: Prime Minister reflects on 'awful' 2021
node.description: Jenna Lynch's uncut interview with the PM on the year that was.
node.content: ["Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern has one word for 2021: Awful.\u00a0", "In this frank interview, Ardern admitted M\u0101ori providers hit too many brick walls in the vaccination campaign and that she may have taken too long to come to terms with not being able to eliminate the Delta outbreak of COVID-19.", "She also revealed her plans for future pandemic planning - including the possible purchase of some of our MIQ facilities as well as considering a specific\u00a0COVID Response agency as called for by the Government's go-to fix it man Sir Brian Roche.\u00a0", "Plus - is her wedding still on?", "Watch the full interview above.\u00a0"]
